mapper.sql: ID, PROCPERSON_ID, A0100, B0100, YSP_ID, YSPDW_ID, AGE, POLITICAL_AFF, JOB, HEALTH, SFSMRY, SMDJ, NSSJ, YSMDJ1, YTMJSSJ1, YSMDJ2, YTMJSSJ2, ZTDW, ZTNRZW, CGSJ, HGSJ, SDGJ, TLSJ, CFRW, CFSY, CGSPDW, PWH, ZYPWH, ZJCGQK, SJCGSJ, SJHGSJ, NFGS, SFYSP, SFZQJWYJ, SCZQJWYJSJ, SFBCZQJWYJ, JWJL, CLSHSFTG, JDCJL, SFZYLD, SFLG, POZNSJD, FMXX, DWJSXS, ZZJL, CXYY, SFTSRY, SFZB, SFBG, SQZT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, SORT_ID, BAH, SFXD, LEADER_BATCH_ID, IS_COMPARISON, ABROAD_PHONE, BZ, SOURCE, IS_ENTRUST, IS_HXPZWJ
mapper.update:
update oms_pub_apply p
p.CXYY = #{cxyy},
p.SQZT = #{sqzt},
p.SFBG = "1"
where p.ID = #{id}

update oms_pub_apply
PROCPERSON_ID = #{procpersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A0100 = #{a0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
B0100 = #{b0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YSP_ID = #{yspId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YSPDW_ID = #{yspdwId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGE = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POLITICAL_AFF = #{politicalAff,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEALTH = #{health,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFSMRY = #{sfsmry,jdbcType=CHAR},
SMDJ = #{smdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NSSJ = #{nssj,jdbcType=DATE},
YSMDJ1 = #{ysmdj1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YTMJSSJ1 = #{ytmjssj1,jdbcType=DATE},
YSMDJ2 = #{ysmdj2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YTMJSSJ2 = #{ytmjssj2,jdbcType=DATE},
ZTDW = #{ztdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZTNRZW = #{ztnrzw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CGSJ = #{cgsj,jdbcType=DATE},
HGSJ = #{hgsj,jdbcType=DATE},
SDGJ = #{sdgj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TLSJ = #{tlsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFRW = #{cfrw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFSY = #{cfsy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CGSPDW = #{cgspdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PWH = #{pwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZYPWH = #{zypwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJCGQK = #{zjcgqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SJCGSJ = #{sjcgsj,jdbcType=DATE},
SJHGSJ = #{sjhgsj,jdbcType=DATE},
NFGS = #{nfgs,jdbcType=CHAR},
SFYSP = #{sfysp,jdbcType=CHAR},
SFZQJWYJ = #{sfzqjwyj,jdbcType=CHAR},
SCZQJWYJSJ = #{sczqjwyjsj,jdbcType=DATE},
SFBCZQJWYJ = #{sfbczqjwyj,jdbcType=CHAR},
JWJL = #{jwjl,jdbcType=CHAR},
CLSHSFTG = #{clshsftg,jdbcType=CHAR},
JDCJL = #{jdcjl,jdbcType=CHAR},
SFZYLD = #{sfzyld,jdbcType=CHAR},
SFLG = #{sflg,jdbcType=CHAR},
POZNSJD = #{poznsjd,jdbcType=CHAR},
FMXX = #{fmxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DWJSXS = #{dwjsxs,jdbcType=CHAR},
ZZJL = #{zzjl,jdbcType=CHAR},
CXYY = #{cxyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFTSRY = #{sftsry,jdbcType=CHAR},
SFZB = #{sfzb,jdbcType=CHAR},
SFBG = #{sfbg,jdbcType=CHAR},
SQZT = #{sqzt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE},
SORT_ID = #{sortId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BAH = #{bah,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFXD = #{sfxd,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEADER_BATCH_ID = #{leaderBatchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_COMPARISON = #{isComparison,jdbcType=CHAR},
ABROAD_PHONE = #{abroadPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_ENTRUST = #{isEntrust,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_HXPZWJ = #{isHxpzwj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where PWH = #{pwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select orp.IDNUMBER_GB as idnumber, orp.id as procpersonId, orp.A0100 as a0100, orp.SEX as sex, CONCAT(IFNULL(orp.SURNAME,''),IFNULL(orp.NAME,'')) as name, orp.BIRTH_DATE_GB as birthDate, orp.POST as job, orp.RF_B0000 as b0111, orp.WORK_UNIT as b0101, orp.POLITICAL_AFFINAME as POLITICAL_AFFI, orp.NATION_NAME as NATION, orp.INCUMBENCY_STATUS as status, op.SECRET_REVIEW_DATE as SECRET_REVIEW_DATE, b.b0100 as b0100 from oms_reg_procpersoninfo orp LEFT JOIN b01 b ON b.b0100 = orp.RF_B0000 LEFT JOIN oms_smr_personinfo op ON orp.id = op.PROC_PERSON_ID
and b.b0100 in
#{b0100}
and (CONCAT(IFNULL(orp.SURNAME,''),IFNULL(orp.NAME,'')) like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or orp.PY like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))

select distinct concat(IFNULL(p.SURNAME,''),IFNULL(p.NAME,'')) as NAME , p.id as procpersonId , p.SEX as SEX , p.BIRTH_DATE_GB as BIRTH_DATE_GB , CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,p.BIRTH_DATE_GB,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y.%m.%d')),'') as AGE , p.POLITICAL_AFFINAME as POLITICAL_AFFINAME , p.A0100 as A0100 , p.SECRET_LEVEL as SECRET_LEVEL , p.NF as NF , p.POST as JOB , i.B0100 as B0100 , i.B0101 as B0101 , op.SECRET_REVIEW_DATE as SECRET_REVIEW_DATE FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo p LEFT JOIN b01 i ON i.b0100 = p.RF_B0000 LEFT JOIN oms_smr_personinfo op ON p.id = op.PROC_PERSON_ID where i.b0100=#{b0100} and p.a0100=#{a0100}
select * from oms_condition where condition_type=#{conditionType}
${sql}

select oms_pub_apply.ID ,oms_pub_apply.CGSJ ,oms_pub_apply.HGSJ ,oms_pub_apply.CFRW ,oms_pub_apply.SDGJ ,oms_pub_apply.CFSY ,oms_pub_apply.JOB ,oms_pub_apply.CREATE_TIME ,oms_pub_apply.SMDJ ,oms_pub_apply.FMXX ,oms_pub_apply.SFBG ,GETDICTITEM('37',oms_pub_apply.sflg,'0') as "SFLG" ,GETDICTITEM('37',oms_pub_apply.sfzyld,'0') as "SFZYLD" ,GETDICTITEM('37',oms_pub_apply.sfbg,'0') as "SFBG" ,GETDICTITEM('37',oms_pub_apply.SFZYLD,'0') as "SFZYLD" ,GETDICTITEM('300',oms_pub_apply.SQZT,'0') as "SQZT" ,concat(oms_reg_procpersoninfo.surname,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.name) as "NAME" ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.SEX ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.BIRTH_DATE_GB ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.NATION_NAME ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.POLITICAL_AFFINAME ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.WORK_UNIT as b0101 from oms_pub_apply inner join oms_b01_temp on oms_pub_apply.b0100=oms_b01_temp.b0100 left join oms_reg_procpersoninfo on oms_pub_apply.PROCPERSON_ID=oms_reg_procpersoninfo.ID where oms_b01_temp.batch_id=#{batchId} and oms_pub_apply.SQZT!='0' order by oms_pub_apply.SQZT,oms_pub_apply.cgsj

select concat(b.SURNAME,b.name) as "NAME" ,b.SEX ,b.BIRTH_DATE_GB ,a.POLITICAL_AFF ,b1.B0101 ,a.JOB ,a.HEALTH ,GETDICTITEM('37',a.SFSMRY,'0') as "SFSMRY" ,a.SMDJ ,a.NSSJ ,a.YSMDJ1 ,a.YTMJSSJ1 ,a.YSMDJ2 ,a.YTMJSSJ2 ,a.ZTDW ,a.ZTNRZW ,a.CGSJ ,a.HGSJ ,a.SDGJ ,a.TLSJ ,a.CFRW ,a.CGSPDW ,a.PWH ,a.ZJCGQK from oms_pub_apply a inner join oms_reg_procpersoninfo b on a.PROCPERSON_ID=b.ID inner join b01 b1 on a.b0100=b1.b0100 where a.id=#{applyId}

select concat(r.SURNAME,r.name) as "NAME",r.SEX,r.BIRTH_DATE_GB,b.B0101 ,o.* from oms_pub_apply o inner join oms_reg_procpersoninfo r on o.PROCPERSON_ID=r.ID inner join b01 b on o.b0100=b.b0100 where o.id=#{id}

select oms_pub_apply.* ,concat(oms_reg_procpersoninfo.surname,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.name) as "NAME" ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.SEX ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.BIRTH_DATE_GB ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.NATION_CODE ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.POLITICAL_AFFINAME ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.WORK_UNIT as b0101 ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.REGISTE_RESIDENCE as REGISTE_RESIDENCE from oms_pub_apply left join oms_reg_procpersoninfo on oms_pub_apply.PROCPERSON_ID=oms_reg_procpersoninfo.ID
and oms_pub_apply.PWH = #{pwh}

select oms_pub_apply.* ,concat(oms_reg_procpersoninfo.surname,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.name) as "NAME" ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.SEX ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.BIRTH_DATE_GB as birthDate ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.NATION_CODE ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.POLITICAL_AFFINAME as politicalAff ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.IDNUMBER_GB as idnumber ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.INCUMBENCY_STATUS as status ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.WORK_UNIT as b0101 from oms_pub_apply left join oms_reg_procpersoninfo on oms_pub_apply.PROCPERSON_ID=oms_reg_procpersoninfo.ID
and oms_pub_apply.YSP_ID = #{yspId}

select "1.填写申请" as label, 1 as statusCode, count(0) as num from oms_pub_apply where SQZT = 1 and SFXD = 1 union all select "2.生成材料" as label, 2 as statusCode, count(0) as num from oms_pub_apply where SQZT = 2 and SFXD = 1 union all select "3.打印材料清单" as label, 3 as statusCode, count(0) as num from oms_pub_apply where SQZT = 3 and SFXD = 1 union all select "4.自评" as label, 5 as statusCode, count(0) as num from oms_pub_apply where SQZT = 5 and SFXD = 1 union all select "5.递交纸质材料" as label, 20 as statusCode, count(0) as num from oms_pub_apply where SQZT = 20 and SFXD = 1

SELECT SUBSTRING(PWH,5,4) as year ,PWH FROM oms_pub_apply WHERE oms_pub_apply.PWH like CONCAT('%','琼台赴字','%')
GROUP BY year,PWH ORDER BY year DESC

SELECT a.a0101 AS NAME, a.a0184 AS idnumber, a.a0100 AS a0100, a.A0104 AS sex, a.A0107 AS birthDate, a.a0192a AS job, b.b0111 AS b0111, b.b0101 AS b0101, b.b0100 AS b0100, `GETDICTITEM` ( '07', `a`.`a0141`, '0' ) AS `POLITICAL_AFFI`, `GETDICTITEM` ( '01', `a`.`a0117`, '0' ) AS `NATION` FROM a01 a JOIN a02 a2 ON a2.a0100 = a.a0100 and a2.A0255='1' AND a2.a0281 = 'true' and a2.A0279='1' JOIN b01 b ON a2.a0201b = b.b0100 WHERE a.a0165 = '02'
and (a.a0101 like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or a.a0102 like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
and b.b0100 in
#{b0100}

SELECT opg.TZFZR FROM oms_pub_group_pre_approval opg LEFT JOIN oms_pub_apply opa ON opg.id = opa.YSP_ID
and opa.ID = #{a0100}

SELECT DISTINCT concat( IFNULL( p.SURNAME, '' ), IFNULL( p.NAME, '' ) ) AS NAME, p.id AS procpersonId, p.SEX AS SEX, p.BIRTH_DATE_GB AS BIRTH_DATE_GB, CONCAT( TIMESTAMPDIFF( YEAR, p.BIRTH_DATE_GB, DATE_FORMAT( NOW( ), '%Y.%m.%d' ) ), '' ) AS AGE, p.POLITICAL_AFFINAME AS POLITICAL_AFFINAME, p.HEALTH AS HEALTH, p.A0100 AS A0100, p.SECRET_LEVEL AS SECRET_LEVEL, p.NF AS NF, p.POST AS JOB, i.B0100 AS B0100, i.B0101 AS B0101, op.SECRET_REVIEW_DATE AS SECRET_REVIEW_DATE FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo p LEFT JOIN b01 i ON i.b0100 = p.RF_B0000 LEFT JOIN oms_smr_personinfo op ON p.id = op.PROC_PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN oms_pub_apply o on o.PROCPERSON_ID = p.id WHERE o.id=#{id}

select oms_pub_apply.* ,concat(oms_reg_procpersoninfo.surname,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.name) as "NAME" ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.SEX ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.BIRTH_DATE_GB ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.NATION_CODE ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.POLITICAL_AFFINAME ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.WORK_UNIT as b0101 from oms_pub_apply left join oms_reg_procpersoninfo on oms_pub_apply.PROCPERSON_ID=oms_reg_procpersoninfo.ID WHERE oms_pub_apply.CGSJ >= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 3 YEAR) and oms_pub_apply.A0100 = #{a0100} and oms_pub_apply.CGSJ < NOW() and oms_pub_apply.sqzt >= 29 and oms_pub_apply.sqzt != 50

select oms_pub_apply.* ,concat(oms_reg_procpersoninfo.surname,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.name) as "NAME" ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.SEX ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.BIRTH_DATE_GB ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.NATION_NAME ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.POLITICAL_AFFINAME ,oms_reg_procpersoninfo.WORK_UNIT as b0101 from oms_pub_apply left join oms_reg_procpersoninfo on oms_pub_apply.PROCPERSON_ID=oms_reg_procpersoninfo.ID
AND oms_pub_apply.CREATE_USER = #{omsOperatorJBYWQueryParam.operatorId}
and oms_pub_apply.CGSJ >= to_date(#{omsOperatorJBYWQueryParam.startTime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and oms_pub_apply.CGSJ <= to_date(#{omsOperatorJBYWQueryParam.endTime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
mapper.insert:
insert into oms_pub_apply( ID, PROCPERSON_ID, A0100, B0100, YSP_ID, YSPDW_ID, AGE, POLITICAL_AFF, JOB, HEALTH, SFSMRY, SMDJ, NSSJ, YSMDJ1, YTMJSSJ1, YSMDJ2, YTMJSSJ2, ZTDW, ZTNRZW, CGSJ, HGSJ, SDGJ, TLSJ, CFRW, CFSY, CGSPDW, PWH, ZYPWH, ZJCGQK, SJCGSJ, SJHGSJ, NFGS, SFYSP, SFZQJWYJ, SCZQJWYJSJ, SFBCZQJWYJ, JWJL, CLSHSFTG, JDCJL, SFZYLD, SFLG, POZNSJD, FMXX, DWJSXS, ZZJL, CXYY, SFTSRY, SFZB, SFBG, SQZT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, SORT_ID, BAH, SFXD, LEADER_BATCH_ID, IS_COMPARISON, ABROAD_PHONE, BZ,SOURCE,IS_ENTRUST, IS_HXPZWJ ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.procpersonId}, #{item.a0100}, #{item.b0100}, #{item.yspId}, #{item.yspdwId}, #{item.age}, #{item.politicalAff}, #{item.job}, #{item.health}, #{item.sfsmry}, #{item.smdj}, #{item.nssj}, #{item.ysmdj1}, #{item.ytmjssj1}, #{item.ysmdj2}, #{item.ytmjssj2}, #{item.ztdw}, #{item.ztnrzw}, #{item.cgsj}, #{item.hgsj}, #{item.sdgj}, #{item.tlsj}, #{item.cfrw}, #{item.cfsy}, #{item.cgspdw}, #{item.pwh}, #{item.zypwh}, #{item.zjcgqk}, #{item.sjcgsj}, #{item.sjhgsj}, #{item.nfgs}, #{item.sfysp}, #{item.sfzqjwyj}, #{item.sczqjwyjsj}, #{item.sfbczqjwyj}, #{item.jwjl}, #{item.clshsftg}, #{item.jdcjl}, #{item.sfzyld}, #{item.sflg}, #{item.poznsjd}, #{item.fmxx}, #{item.dwjsxs}, #{item.zzjl}, #{item.cxyy}, #{item.sftsry}, #{item.sfzb}, #{item.sfbg}, #{item.sqzt}, #{item.createUser}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.modifyUser}, #{item.modifyTime}, #{item.sortId}, #{item.bah}, #{item.sfxd}, #{item.leaderBatchId}, #{item.isComparison}, #{item.abroadPhone}, #{item.bz}, #{item.source}, #{item.isEntrust}, #{item.isHxpzwj} )
